contentrichtext.text: '''Robert Atkins''' may refer to: * [[Robert Atkins (nutritionist)]] (1930–2003), American physician noted for the Atkins diet * [[Robert Atkins (actor)]] (1886–1972), British film and theatre actor * [[Robert Atkins (politician)]] (born 1946), United Kingdom Conservative Party politician * [[Robert Atkins (comics)]] (born 1979), American comics artist * [[Bob Atkins]] (born 1962), English footballer * [[Bob Atkins (American football)]] (born 1946), American football player ==See also== *[[Robert Atkyns (disambiguation)]] {{hndis|name=Atkins, Robert}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Atkins, Robert}}
